735110.name: Defenders of Tetsoidea
735110.description:
Join Leira and Tens, as they end up in a fight against a world-destroying corporation intent on meddling with the natural order of things with disastrous results. Recruit friends to help find the root of the mysterious changes, and learn about their bizarre pasts along the way. Travel through a technologically advanced world and use what you can to survive. This game is a basic turn-based RPG with a few twists: long and close range abilities that must be used strategically to win. Also, there are a few strange elements of humor such as consumable diapers and clowns at urinals, but that's up to the player to discover.

Features:

    A neat futuristic world to explore.

    Long and short range combat strategies.

    A random grocery store side quest.

    A stealth sequence.
